PSCT.Base: Cannot be Special Summoned, except with the effect of a "Myutant" card. Your opponent cannot target this card with Spell effects. You can only use each of the following effects of "Myutant Mist" once per turn. When your opponent activates a Trap Card or effect (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 card from your hand or field; draw 2 cards. If this card in its owner's possession is destroyed by an opponent's card: You can target 1 of your banished "Myutant" monsters; add it to your hand.
